## Code Quality Checklist

<!-- Ensure your code meets quality standards -->

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary (especially complex logic)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have updated the TypeScript types where applicable

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, API docs, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated code comments for public APIs
- [ ] Documentation changes are clear and accurate

### Localization

- [ ] I have added translations for both Bulgarian and English
- [ ] Translation keys follow the existing naming conventions
- [ ] Text is not hardcoded (uses i18n keys)
- [ ] Not applicable (no user-facing text changes)

### Testing

- [ ] New code has appropriate test coverage
- [ ] Tests are clear and maintainable
- [ ] Edge cases are covered

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders or database queries
- [ ] Images are optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] No performance regressions introduced
